slides.title: Tranquil holiday accommodation
slides.alt: Coffs Harbour Cabins Friday Creek Retreat

slides.title: Nine cottages nestled in the Orara Valley hills.

welcome.title: Welcome to Friday Creek Retreat
welcome.description: Tucked amongst the hinterland's rolling hills, our retreat cottages offer privacy and seclusion only 15 minutes from the coastal city of Coffs Harbour. Nine cottages, each with its own unique d√©cor and personality, nestle amongst the trees, rolling hills and green pastures. A place to truly relax and escape the world's hustle and bustle.

directBooking.title: Direct Bookings During Peak Times
directBooking.description: We often have more availability for direct bookings than you'll find on online travel agencies, especially during peak times such as Christmas and long weekends. To ensure you secure your preferred dates, we recommend booking directly with us.

featuredCottages.name: The Big House
featuredCottages.subtitle: Cottage 1
featuredCottages.description: This house-size cottage is the perfect accommodation for one or more families to enjoy the beautiful Coffs Harbour hinterland. With 3 bedrooms, a sofa bed and the option to add rollaway beds, the house can comfortably sleep up to 8 people.

featuredCottages.name: Tribal Cottage
featuredCottages.subtitle: Cottage 2
featuredCottages.description: Looking for unique accommodation for your Coffs Coast holiday? Look no further than our Tribal Cottage with its earthy mix of classic and contemporary Aboriginal art and hand selected tribal crafts and wall hangings.

featuredCottages.name: Asian Cottage
featuredCottages.subtitle: Cottage 3
featuredCottages.description: Our Asian cottage for two, beautifully blends Asian culture with the rolling green hills of the Coffs hinterland. Your romantic 1-bedroom getaway is far away from the everyday.

petFriendly.title: Friday Creek Retreat is Pet Friendly!
